name: Panic
description:
Panic, a psychological horror game based on mental disorder. Your task is to confront the paranormal activities and monstrous beings that appear out of nowhere in David's mind. With its immersive gameplay and hair-raising atmosphere, this game will keep you on the edge of your seat. Your duty is to help David navigate through his mind and overcome his inner demons. Be ready to face the unknown and help David break free from his mental state.

IMMERSE YOURSELF IN NEXT-GEN HORROR

We take inspiration from real world mental disorders when creating this game, giving you an immersive experience of the horror and nightmare that someone with mental illness must endure. This game is designed to give you a glimpse into the struggles and challenges faced by those dealing with mental health issues, allowing you to gain a better understanding of their experiences.

UNRAVEL THE MYSTERY OF DAVID

Nightmares, a reflection of the deep-rooted issues that have been tormenting him and filling him with fear and insecurity. You are invited to dive into his mind, uncovering the deeper mysteries of the incidents that have disturbed him so. Get ready for an unimaginable journey.

REPLAYABILITY

David's story can unfold in not one, not two, but four different ways! Experience the thrill of discovering unique storylines and engaging in dialogue with David's inner voice in each of the possible endings.

THEME

The game takes place in a spine-chilling haunted house, an eerily dark forest, and a desolate, abandoned alien base. You play as a character struggling with their mental health and must navigate the dangerous world around them.

MECHANICS

The game mechanics are designed to challenge the player and encourage them to think critically about their choices. The game features combat mechanics that allow the player to fight off monsters and other enemies. Additionally, the game also includes exploration mechanics, where the player must navigate the environment.
